Settings Puff IME
"Puff is an open-source offline password manager. \n" "Puff will never upload your account information to internet.\" "Puff uses Bcrypt (Blowfish encrypt) to encrypt your account information. \n"
"Bcrypt is an industrial level encryption algorithm. \n" "You can read more about bcrypt in below link." g

Copy and Close "This utility will generate a secure password for you. Enter password length and click next button. Which kind of password do you need? Numbers Only Secure Password Secure and Easy to Remember Tell me your favorite words, I\'ll generate a secure password from them. Word One Word Two Word Three Word Four Additional Clear Click add button to add a new account Edit Delete Password Generator Choose your master password wisely. \nOnce you forget it, there is no way to recover your data.
